description.value:
Trigger An area within 60 feet has its light level reduced due to magical darkness.

Your vitality network regains Hit Points equal to the spell rank of the magical darkness if the affected area was normally dim light, and doubled if the affected area was normally bright light. Even if the magical darkness ends, the area's light level remains non-magical darkness for 1 minute; this effect removes light in the area but isn't magical darkness and is automatically overcome by any form of magical light.
